introduction: Director Nisha Ganatra will helm a movie about an Indian boy band, inspired by the life of music producer and songwriter Savan Kotecha.The project has been set up at Universal with Marc Platt's Marc Platt Productions set to produce. Along with Platt and Kotecha, Adam Siegel will produce. Ryan Christians will oversee the project for Marc Platt Productions. Jacob Epstein, Zach Morgenroth, Aleen Keshishian and Sonny Takhar will executive produce.
